original_text: “The Lord has driven out before you great and powerful nations; to this day no one has been able to withstand you.
korean_text: 이는 여호와께서 강대한 나라들을 너희의 앞에서 쫓아내셨으므로 오늘까지 너희에게 맞선 자가 하나도 없었느니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has driven out before you
to this day no one has been able to withstand you
